medical_history.chief_complaint: Fever and left lower quadrant aching pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began with subjective fever and chills after returning home from rehab. LLQ ache started but did not worsen. Patient reports back soreness rated 8 out of 10. Constipation with one bowel movement every few days since surgery.
medical_history.past_medical_history: HFpEF, CKD Stage 3, HTN, BPH, NPH s/p VP shunt, spinal stenosis, stasis dermatitis, seizure disorder, previous laminectomies, left inguinal hernia repair.
medical_history.family_history: Mother died of cancer, father died of old age, brother died of lung cancer, one son alive and well.
